name: BlisNodeDesc
brief:
Node description storing LP basis and branching info

Extends BcpsNodeDesc with simplex warm start and pseudo-cost data.
Contains the state needed to reconstruct a search tree node.

**Warm start data:**
- basis_: CoinWarmStartBasis for LP hot-starting
- Stores structural and artificial variable status (basic/nonbasic)

**Branching history (for pseudo-cost updates):**
- branchedDir_: Direction of branch that created this node (-1/+1)
- branchedInd_: Object index that was branched on
- branchedVal_: Value at branching point (used in pseudo-cost update)

**Serialization:**
encode()/decode() serialize basis and branching info for MPI.
Uses BlisEncodeWarmStart/BlisDecodeWarmStart helpers.
see: BlisTreeNode for the node using this description
